insert into p_order (orderNo, `uid`, goodsId, zoneType, isSuit, `state`, goodsName, totalPrice, realPrice, `number`, payType, receiptName, receiptPhone, receiptSite, suiteName, isDel, createTime, payTime, wxOrderNo, callbackPrice, logisticsName, logisticsNo, seendTime, userNote, backNote) values (#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{zoneType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isSuit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{realPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiptPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiptSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{wxOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callbackPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{logisticsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logisticsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update p_order
orderNo = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`uid` = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
goodsId = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
zoneType = #{zoneType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isSuit = #{isSuit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goodsName = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
totalPrice = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
realPrice = #{realPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
`number` = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payType = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
receiptName = #{receiptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiptPhone = #{receiptPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiptSite = #{receiptSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
suiteName = #{suiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isDel = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
payTime = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
wxOrderNo = #{wxOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
callbackPrice = #{callbackPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
logisticsName = #{logisticsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logisticsNo = #{logisticsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seendTime = #{seendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
userNote = #{userNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
backNote = #{backNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isKnot = #{isKnot},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update p_order set orderNo = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `uid` = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goodsId = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, zoneType = #{zoneType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isSuit = #{isSuit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goodsName = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalPrice = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, realPrice = #{realPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, `number` = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payType = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receiptName = #{receiptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiptPhone = #{receiptPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiptSite = #{receiptSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suiteName = #{suiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isDel = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, payTime = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, wxOrderNo = #{wxOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, callbackPrice = #{callbackPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, logisticsName = #{logisticsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logisticsNo = #{logisticsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seendTime = #{seendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, userNote = #{userNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, backNote = #{backNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(number),0) from p_order where uid=#{uid} and isSuit=1 and zoneType != 2 and id!=#{id} and state >= 1
mapper.update: update p_order set state = 3 where state = 2 and seendTime <= #{seendTime}
update p_order set isDel = -1 where state = 0 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id from p_order where state = 0 and createTime <= #{createTime}
select o.*,u.phone userPhone from p_order o left join p_user u on o.uid=u.id where o.id=#{0}
select id as orderId,goodsId,zoneType,totalPrice,number as orderNum from p_order where id=#{0} and isDel = 0 and state = 0

select (select count(*) from p_order where state > 0 and to_days(createTime)=to_days(now())) as orderNum, (select count(*) from p_order where state = 0) as stayPayNum, (select count(*) from p_order where state = 1) as stayHairNum, (select count(*) from p_order where state = 2) as hairNum, (select count(*) from p_order where state = 2) as achieveNum, (select ifnull(sum(realPrice),0.00) from p_order where state > 0 and to_days(payTime)=to_days(now())) as todaySales, (select ifnull(sum(realPrice),0.00) from p_order where state > 0 and to_days(payTime)=to_days(now())-1) as yesterdaySales, (select ifnull(sum(realPrice),0.00) from p_order where state > 0 and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= date(payTime) ) as sevenSales, (select count(*) from p_user where to_days(createTime)=to_days(now())) as todayUserNum, (select count(*) from p_user where to_days(createTime)=to_days(now())-1) as yesterdayUserNum, (select count(*) from p_user where month(createTime)=month(curdate()) AND year(createTime) = year(curdate())) as monthUserNum, (select count(*) from p_user) as allUserNum
